conclusion: Violation of Article 11 - Freedom of assembly and association (Article 11-1 - Freedom of peaceful assembly)
docname: CASE OF ÖLLINGER v. AUSTRIA - [Russian Translation]
scl: Feldek v. Slovakia, no. 29032/95, § 104, ECHR 2001-VIII;Jerusalem v. Austria, no. 26958/95, § 36, ECHR 2001-II;Otto-Preminger-Institut v. Austria, judgment of 21 June 1988, Series A no. 139, p. 12, § 32 and § 34;Scharsach and News Verlagsgesellschaft v. Austria, no. 39394/98, § 30, ECHR 2003-XI;Stankov and the United Macedonian Organisation Ilinden v.
